ingredients.ingredient: salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 (1.2 oz) patty fully cooked breakfast sausage

gear.name: small oven-safe bowl or ramekin for egg

cookingTips: Spray the ramekin or bowl generously so the egg doesn't stick
Cook the egg first, then add other components at the end to prevent cheese from overcooking
Assemble the sandwich immediately after components are cooked for best temperature and texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Walk me through cooking a quick egg in the air fryer, warming the sausage and English muffin, melting the cheese, and assembling a hot breakfast sandwich.
